Create OTA gaps bad pixel masks¶

get_gaps.get_gaps(img, ota)[source]¶

Create a numpy array mask of the gaps in an ota.

Parameters:
  • img (str) – Name of image
  • ota (str) – Name of OTA
Returns:

gaps_mask – A numpy array of the gap location on the ota.
Return type:

numpy array
get_gaps.get_gaps_rep(img, ota)[source]¶

Create a numpy array mask of the gaps in a reprojected ota.

Parameters:
  • img (str) – Name of image
  • ota (str) – Name of OTA
Returns:

gaps_mask – A numpy array of the gap location on the ota.
Return type:

numpy array
